meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Philip Cramer Celeste Walker Kathy Chappell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4425.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Philip Cramer, a business owner from Sherman Oaks, California
Celeste Walker, a graduate student from Washington, D.C.
Kathy Chappell, a writer from Burke, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,800)

tr.td: BEATLES LYRICS
PAPERBACK WRITER
TICKET TO RIDE
STRAWBERRY FIELDS FOREVER
THE LONG & WINDING ROAD
LET IT "B"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"You say yes, I say no, you say stop, and I say go, go, go"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "You say yes, I say no, you say stop, and I say go, go, go"
